content.webTitle: Best pictures of the day - live

fields.headline: Best pictures of the day - live
fields.bodyText: If you haven't got time to look at our picture blog you can check out our 10 photo highlights of the day by our head of photography Roger Tooth Evacuation underway on east coast and in Wales with severe floods forecast, while 100 mph gales hit Scotland and the north. See all the latest images in our gallery Joshua Cator became the poster child in the aftermath of Typhoon Haiyan in the Philippines. Photographer Dennis M Sabangan visited Joshua and documented his life since the typhoon - you can see the images in our gallery Our photographer Graeme Robertson has been with students protesting at University of London's Senate House and has sent us this Instagram image. The protesters had occupied part of the building. Yesterday a police officer was accused of punching one of the protesters as police tried to remove them from the building. Read more on the story Missed the Autumn Statement - find out what went on with our key points Rod Stewart has announced plan to reunite with the Faces - in our gallery we look back at highlights George Osborne is on his way to deliver the Autumn Statement to Parliament that will contain the news that the age of retirement is to be raised to 70. Follow events in our politics live blog Winter storms are battering Scotland with the east coast braced for floods. You can follow events in our live blog. Please contribute your photos and videos via GuardianWitness. First puppy Sunny stole the show at Michelle Obama's Christmas event at the White House. See our gallery of the sequence of events here
